general.descriptionIndex: A web developer retraining after three years in communications, I combine creativity, project management and technical skills (Vue.js, Laravel, Java). My goal: to design versatile and innovative web solutions that combine technical expertise with user-friendliness.
general.btnRecommendation: Read the full recommendation on LinkedIn

nineteen.title: Web Developer
nineteen.description: Creation of pages on the Digital Test Center website using the Vue.js, Nuxt.js and Tailwind CSS frameworks
nineteen.aboutCompany: (nineteen)² is a company specialising in the development of web and mobile applications dedicated to sporting events. It designs and publishes the Digital Test Centre solution, intended for manufacturers, retailers and event organisers offering product testing.

pvv.title: Communications manager
pvv.description: Overall communication for club events (social networks, posters, flyers, etc.), creating content for the club's social networks, managing and sending out the newsletter
pvv.recommendation: I had the pleasure of working with Théa for 2 years. It was an extremely positive and rewarding experience, both professionally and personally. Théa is a trustworthy, serious and rigorous person, who invests herself fully in every task she undertakes. Her ability to carry out assignments with great attention to detail and organization makes her a person you can rely on.

epage.title: Communications manager
epage.description: Organisation of official ceremonies, management of social networks, creation of print media

master.title: Masters in Information, Public Communication and the Media

licence.title: Professional degree in Sustainable Development of Territories through e-Commerce and e-Tourism

dut.title: Associate's Degree in Administrative and Commercial Management of Organisations

social.title: Social Media Manager
social.description: Day-to-day management of the Facebook, Instagram and LinkedIn accounts: planning and publishing content, animating communities, moderating comments and private messages. Creating attractive visuals, writing texts adapted to each platform, and monitoring performance using analysis tools. Objective: to develop brand awareness, boost engagement and support marketing objectives.

graphic.title: Design of communication materials
graphic.description: Graphic design of a banner and tarpaulin in the colours of GUC Grenoble Ski.

quaterlyBulletin.title: Preparation of a quarterly municipal newsletter
quaterlyBulletin.description: Layout of a sample newsletter, formatting of elements (text & images).

dtc.title: Landing page creation
dtc.description: Layout, design and development of a landing page for the Digital Test Centre website

event.title: Event coordination and organisation
event.description: Organisation of official inaugurations and sporting events, communication before, during and after events
event.coordinator: Coordination with elected officials and stakeholders

aboutMe.description: After several years' experience in the communications field, where I had the opportunity to work in a variety of sectors - public, private and voluntary - I decided to enhance my skills. That's why I took the “Advanced Developer” course at Campus Numérique in the Alps.
aboutMe.riasec: Beyond my professional background, my RIASEC profile reveals that I'm a social, methodical and curious person. Social, because I enjoy working in a team and collaborating on joint projects. Methodical, because I feel at ease in a structured environment that requires rigour, organisation and precision. And curious, because I love learning, discovering and understanding new things.

travelling.title: Travelling
travelling.description: I have been fortunate enough to travel throughout France, visit Réunion island, and travel to Germany, Ireland, Wales, and Portugal.

reading.title: Reading
reading.description: My pile of books to read never really gets any smaller. I'm curious about all genres, but I have a slight preference for crime novels, thrillers and fantasy. My favourite book? The Book Thief by Markus Zusak.

sports.title: Sports
sports.description: I have been playing basketball for several years, hiking when I get the chance, and I also really enjoy rugby. Sports embodies values that I consider essential in both my professional and personal life.
